summary: The document discusses allegations against Southern Financial Group, Inc. regarding fraudulent activities related to the sale of short-term notes. It mentions a specific event from December 22, 2004, where the company allegedly raised at least $25 million through a fraudulent scheme involving UC Properties LLC.

events.title: Fraud Allegation Against Southern Financial Group
events.description: Southern Financial Group, Inc. is alleged to have raised at least $25 million through a fraudulent scheme involving the sale of short-term notes on behalf of UC Properties LLC.

keyFacts: Southern Financial Group, Inc. is alleged to have engaged in fraudulent activities.
The fraudulent scheme involved the sale of short-term notes.
The scheme allegedly raised at least $25 million.
The scheme was associated with UC Properties LLC.
